backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the chat backend, defining types (Message, Chatroom, UserProfile, etc.) and managing chatrooms, messages, reactions, active users, and access control using ordered maps and imported modules for storage, HTTP outcalls, and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that MessageBubble.tsx implements native mobile long-press suppression via preventDefault(), touch-action, and -webkit-touch-callout CSS properties.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing the purpose and key implementation details of components, pages, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point for the React app with viewport meta tags disabling user scaling, cache-busting meta directives, and a versioned module script tag loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with lobby, chatroom, and admin routes, conditionally rendering Header and Footer while hiding both on admin pages.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component allowing users to set their avatar via file upload or by selecting a GIF from Giphy search/trending results, with debounced search and request-race protection.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface component that fetches and displays messages, handles auto-scroll and deep-link scroll-to-target, manages reply context state, and renders MessageBubble and MessageInput components.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, along with live status badges, viewer counts, and metadata like topic, category, and last message timestamp.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: A dialog form for creating a new chatroom, supporting topic, description, category selection, and media attachment via file upload, video URL (YouTube/Twitch), or Twitter post with live preview.
frontend/src/components/ExternalLinkDisc: A confirmation modal that warns users they are leaving the app when clicking an external link, displaying the target URL and requiring explicit confirmation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A simple footer component displaying a copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: The app header with the Chattr logo, an inline editable username field with alphanumeric validation, an avatar picker, and a back button when inside a chatroom.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: A no-op placeholder component that renders nothing, explicitly noting that authentication is not used in this app.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders an individual chat message bubble with support for reactions, pinning, replies, URL link detection, embedded YouTube/Twitch/Twitter previews, GIF display, voice message playback, reporting, and a context menu.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: A chat message input component supporting text entry, image upload, GIF search via Giphy, voice recording, and automatic detection of YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URLs embedded in the message text.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Renders a pinned YouTube or Twitch video embed within a chatroom, with an unpin button that calls the useUnpinVideo mutation.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player component for voice messages featuring a waveform visualization, play/pause toggle, seek slider, and time display, with support for pausing other concurrent audio elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates all dependent queries whenever the actor instance changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Generic hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay, returning the latest stable value after the delay has elapsed.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Hook that purges stale or empty chatroom cache entries and forces a fresh refetch of the chatrooms list once the ICP actor becomes ready, exposing a recovery-in-progress flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context (login, logout, identity state) via a React context and AuthClient, with support for delegation validity checks and configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Central React Query hooks file covering chatroom fetching/searching/filtering, message operations, reactions, image upload, voice messages, and pinned video mutations against the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives, defines light/dark theme CSS custom properties (OKLCH color tokens), and includes mobile-specific input styles and custom voice message range input styling.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports frontend configuration constants including the Giphy API key and result limit.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Exports a `formatCompactNumber` utility that converts large numbers to compact human-readable strings (k, M, B notation).
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides `searchGiphy` and `fetchTrendingGiphy` functions that call the Giphy API and return normalized GIF objects with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a lazy-loader for the html2canvas library.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses image files using a canvas, skipping GIFs/SVGs and falling back to the original if compression increases file size.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a Twitter embed rendering utility.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON to extract safe preview fields (author, text, image) with in-flight deduplication and localStorage caching.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: localStorage cache layer for Twitter oEmbed preview data, supporting versioned entries with a 7-day expiration and cache-key derivation from tweet IDs.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a Twitter thumbnail fetching utility.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a Twitter thumbnail caching utility.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility module with functions to extract video/clip IDs from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter/X URLs and generate corresponding thumbnail and embed URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that mounts the app with React Query, Internet Identity, and the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Password-protected admin moderation page that lists chatrooms with flagged message counts, supports filtering/searching, and allows admins to delete chatrooms via a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Page component that loads a specific chatroom by ID, handles loading/error states, increments view count on load, and renders the ChatArea with an optional target message for deep-linking.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Lobby page displaying all chatrooms with client-side search, category filtering, and algorithmic sorting (live rooms first, then by view count and creation date), plus a dialog to create new chatrooms.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, border radius, box shadow, accordion keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking version, existing features, and a fix request to suppress native mobile long-press behavior (context menu, text selection) in MessageBubble.tsx using preventDefault and CSS properties.
